VMTurbo Turboticker | April 2014 GET A FREE VMT-SHIRT. Click Here: <http://bit.ly/R1gxEb> Free Virtual Health Monitoring Tool Download Free Virtual Health Monitor: <http://bit.ly/1hdGf1C> Download VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor today, absolutely free <http://bit.ly/1hdGf1C>. Virtual Health Monitor installs on any hypervisor(s), provides real-time performance monitoring, and scales automatically as your environment grows. Gain visibility, and download .pdf efficiency and performance reports at any time. Virtual Health Monitor is freeware, and yours to keep forever. We call it "Forevereeware". "It's A Game Changer"
Alpha Maxx Healthcare, a Memphis-based perinatal care clinic serving Tennessee's highest-risk pregnancies, is the latest installment in VMTurbo's Customer Success Series. Check out the video <http://bit.ly/1e8p81N> featuring Alpha Maxx President Chuck Green, and see the role VMTurbo plays in this amazing story.
vStimulate Your vEconomy
Jeff Wilson, one of the panelists from our recent visit to GestaltIT‘s Tech Field Day, wrote an epic review of VMTurbo <http://bit.ly/1n07X2g> over at Agnostic Computing in “#VFD3: VMTurbo wants to vStimulate your vEconomy".
#vHaiku We're writing haikus, Because we're witty like that. Try VMTurbo <http://try.vmturbo.com/vhaiku?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker>. (It's Free.)
